txt.en: 'I see you were successful! Here is your pay. Ready to hunt a deadlier beast?'

'Hail, adventurer. You look like you can handle yourself out there. How about a challenge? I am a huntsman and fur-trader, and there is plenty to hunt in the Dale-lands. But, there are some well-known beasts that lurk in the wilds that even I have been unable to defeat. If you were to do some hunting for me, I would make it worth your while.\n\n'Avanc are a good place to start. They are dangerous to be sure, but slow and simple creatures. Hunt them in the marshes near Loeglond, and find their leader, Fenskin. Beware of his powerful bite.'
Northern river-avanc and Fenskin can be found in the Marshes in the Dale-lands.\n\nYou should hunt northern river-avanc and Fenskin.
Rékar the Huntsman can be found in Dale.\n\nYou should talk to Rékar.
Rékar the Huntsman has challenged you to bring down some well-known beasts in the Dale-lands.
